main event: A UFO sighting was reported on August 29, 1961, over Fremont, California, involving an object with distinctive colored lights.
interesting points: The object had a red light on the bottom and two detached green lights on top and bottom with an intermittent flashing pattern., The sighting lasted approximately 45 minutes., One witness reported hearing a buzzing sound., The object was observed while three aircraft were reported to be in the vicinity., Conditions were clear during the sighting.
sighted object: UFO with red and green lights
